H0.text: Who is universally accepted to be the first Roman Emperor (27bc). Julius Caesar

H1.text: Who is universally accepted to be the first Roman Emperor (27bc). Pompey the Great

H2.text: Who is universally accepted to be the first Roman Emperor (27bc). Mark Antony

H3.text: Who is universally accepted to be the first Roman Emperor (27bc). Agustus

A4.text: Augustus (born Gaius Octavius; 23 September 63 BC â€“ 19 August AD 14) was the founder of the Roman Empire, who reigned as the first Roman emperor from 27 BC until his death in AD 14.

A5.text: Following the assassination of Julius Caesar in 44 BC, Octavian was named in Caesar's will as his primary heir.
